price: Such are those who will have a terrible punishment, and it is they who will be the greatest losers in the Hereafter.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
